channel.title: Addison

channel.title: Heartland
channel.desc: Amy helps a vaulting team ahead of a big competition; Caleb struggles with a tough decision about Carson; Logan realizes where his future lies; Lou and Jessica face a stressful gallery opening.

channel.desc: News program bringing Canadians breaking news and live coverage from across Canada and around the world.

channel.title: Escape to the Country
channel.desc: Chris Bavin and today's couple marvel at Shropshire's stunning countryside in between checking out some tempting homes from the county's property market; taking time away from the house search, Chris's taste buds are in for a treat.

channel.title: Kim's Convenience
channel.desc: While Appa is reluctant to have a houseguest, Umma is the one who ends up having problems with their visitor; Jung accuses Janet of being cold-hearted; Shannon tackles an office bullying problem.

channel.desc: James Herriot interviews for a new job with Yorkshire veterinarian Siegfried Farnon, and his first day is one full of surprises.

channel.desc: Rav asks the bakers to create monstrously creative cookies, and for the Showstopper, the bakers are tasked with showcasing what they think is the world's greatest invention, in biscuit form.

channel.desc: Tracy schemes to get Cassie out of her hair and back into Fiz's good books.
